title: Preserve async method ABI metadata for separate-compilation callers across optimization modes

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
abi_requirements: async method entry and call-site lowering use coroutine-based async ABI instead of synchronous return ABI
module and textual interface both retain async effect metadata needed by separate-compilation importers
call-site lowering preserves await-required suspension boundary for async method dispatch

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
abi_requirements: optimized async method lowering preserves entry and call ABI shape from -O0
selector spelling remains source-level while async ABI metadata drives importer lowering
optimized module/interface emission keeps async ABI metadata fields stable

abi_field_stability.stability_property: importers and exporters agree that declaration uses async coroutine ABI
async method dispatch lowers through await suspension boundary with a stable ABI contract
